pages.text: The $(thing)Prospecting Kit$() allows you to search for underground ore deposits with greater accuracy.$(br2)The prospecting kit searches a $(thing)5 x 5$() area around the player with a depth of $(thing)20$(), or a depth of $(thing)10$() with $(item)$(k:key.sneak)$().

To process the ore samples collected, first dig away at the surface material by clicking the $(thing)Trowel Icon$(). This will reveal the underground location of ores, centered around the player. Note that the top of the menu points North.$(br2)Next, brush away the loose material by clicking the $(thing)Brush Icon$(). This will reveal what ores have been found, as well as their quantity relative to the area searched.
